mapper.select: select t.id, o.id, t.team_name, o.is_over, t.create_time, t.update_time from user u, team_okr t, okr_core o, team_personal_okr tp where u.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and u.is_deleted = 0 and t.is_deleted = 0 and o.is_deleted = 0 and tp.is_deleted = 0 and u.id = tp.user_id and t.core_id = o.id and tp.team_id = t.id order by o.is_over, o.create_time desc
